member.name: T:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode
member.summary: Specifies the types of error codes that can be returned from the Analysis library.
member.seealso: Key Measurement Studio Analysis .NET Library Concepts

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.OutOfMemory
member.summary: Specified operation does not have enough memory available.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.SamplesNotEqual
member.summary: Specified input sequences are not the same size.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.SamplesMustBeGTZero
member.summary: Specified samples must be greater than zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.SamplesMustBeGEZero
member.summary: Specified samples must be greater than or equal to zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.SamplesMustBeGEOne
member.summary: Specified samples must be greater than or equal to one.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.SamplesMustBeGETwo
member.summary: Specified samples must be greater than or equal to two.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.SamplesMustBeGEThree
member.summary: Specified samples must be greater than or equal to three.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.ArraySizeIncorrect
member.summary: Specified array size is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.ArraySizeNotPowerOfTwo
member.summary: Specified array size is not a power of 2.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.MaximumTransformSizeExceeded
member.summary: Maximum transform size has been exceeded.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.DutyCycleIncorrect
member.summary: Specified duty cycle value is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NumberOfCyclesIncorrect
member.summary: Number of cycles is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.WidthIncorrect
member.summary: Specified width is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.DelayWidthIncorrect
member.summary: Sum of delay and width must be less than number of samples.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.DTMustBeGEZero
member.summary: Dt value must be greater than or equal to zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.DTMustBeGTZero
member.summary: Dt value must be greater than zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.IndexCannotBeLTSamples
member.summary: Index cannot be less than the number of samples.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.IndexLengthIncorrect
member.summary: Index length is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.UpperMustBeGELower
member.summary: Upper value must be greater than or equal to the lower value.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NyquistConditionError
member.summary: Specified cutoff frequency must be greater than zero and less than half the sampling rate.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.OrderMustBeGTZero
member.summary: Order must be greater than zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InvalidDecimatingFactor
member.summary: Specified decimating factor is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InvalidBandSpecification
member.summary: Specified band is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.RippleMustBeGTZero
member.summary: Specified ripple must be greater than zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.AttenuationMustBeGTZero
member.summary: Specified attenuation must be greater than zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.WidthMustBeGTZero
member.summary: Specified width must be greater than zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.FinalValueMustBeGTZero
member.summary: Specified final value must be greater than zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.AttenuationMustBeGTRipple
member.summary: Specified attenuation must be greater than the ripple amplitude.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.StepSizeIncorrect
member.summary: Specified step size is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.LeakageCoefficientIncorrect
member.summary: Specified leakage coefficient is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.EquiRippleDesignIncorrect
member.summary: Specified EquiRipple filter design is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.FilterRankIncorrect
member.summary: Specified filter rank is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NumberOfCoefficientMustBeOdd
member.summary: Number of coefficients must be odd.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NumberOfCoefficientMustBeEven
member.summary: Number of coefficients must be even.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.StandardDeviationMustBeGTZero
member.summary: Specified standard deviation must be greater than zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.MixedSignsInArray
member.summary: Specified matrix contains mixed signs.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.SizeMustBeGTOrder
member.summary: Specified array size must be greater than the order.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.IntervalsMustBeGTZero
member.summary: The number of intervals must be greater than zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.MatrixMultiplicationFailed
member.summary: Matrix multiplication failed.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NotSquareMatrix
member.summary: Specified matrix is not a square matrix.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.MatrixCannotBeSingular
member.summary: Specified matrix cannot be singular. A singular matrix is a matrix that has no inverse.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.LevelsOutOfRange
member.summary: Specified levels are out of range.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.FactorOutOfRange
member.summary: Level of factor is outside the allowable range.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.ObservationMissingInLevel
member.summary: Specified level has a missing observation.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.DataPointsTotalInvalid
member.summary: The total number of data points is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.Overflow
member.summary: Specified operation resulted in an overflow error.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.DataUnbalanced
member.summary: Data is unbalanced.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.FixedEffectModelRequired
member.summary: Random Effect model was requested when the Fixed Effect model is required.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InputValuesMustBeDistinct
member.summary: The specified input values must be distinct.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.PoleAtRequestedValue
member.summary: Interpolating method has a pole at the requested value.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.FirstColumnNotAllOnes
member.summary: The first column in the specified matrix cannot be all ones.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InvalidDegreesOfFreedom
member.summary: Specified degrees if freedom is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.IncorrectProbability
member.summary: Specified probability must be between 0 and 1.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InvalidProbability
member.summary: Specified probability is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.CategoriesInvalid
member.summary: Specified categories are invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.ContingencyTableInvalid
member.summary: Invalid number of categories or samples.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InvalidBetaFunctionParameter
member.summary: The specified beta method parameter is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InvalidDimension
member.summary: Specified dimension is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NegativeNumber
member.summary: Negative number error.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.DivideByZero
member.summary: A divide by zero error has occurred.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InvalidSelection
member.summary: Specified selection is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.MaxIterationsExceeded
member.summary: Maximum iterations have been exceeded.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InvalidPolynomial
member.summary: Specified polynomial is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InternalMemoryStateInvalid
member.summary: The internal memory state is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.ZeroVector
member.summary: Specified vector cannot have all zero elements.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InvalidIirFilterInfo
member.summary: Specified IIR filter information is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.FundamentalFrequencyOrSamplingRateInvalid
member.summary: Specified fundamental frequency or sampling rate is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.MatrixContainsInvalidDouble
member.summary: The input arguments have at least one element that is either infinity, not a number (NaN), double maximum, or double minimum.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.SamplesMustBeGEFour
member.summary: The specified samples must be greater than or equal to four.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.MatricesMustHaveSameSize
member.summary: The matrices must have the same size.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InputNotPositiveDefinite
member.summary: The input to the Cholesky Decomposition was not positive definite.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.CannotComputeMatrixLogarithm
member.summary: The logarithm of the input matrix cannot be computed.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.EigenValuesTooClose
member.summary: The eigenvalues cannot be reordered because some eigenvalues are too close.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.ReorderingChangedEigenValues
member.summary: Reordering eigenvalues changed some complex eigenvalues.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.FilterBufferOverflow
member.summary: The filter buffer has overflowed.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.ResamplePointCannotBeCalculated
member.summary: The resample point cannot be calculated with the signal behind that of input.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.BaseMustBeLTTop
member.summary: Base must be less than top.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.ShiftRangeInvalid
member.summary: The specified shift range is invalid. The number of shifts must be less than the length of the shifted array.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NoFeasibleSolution
member.summary: Feasible solution not found for the given input.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.OrderMustBeGEZero
member.summary: Order must be greater than or equal to zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NumberIsNegativeOrZero
member.summary: Curve-fitting error. The number is negative or zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NumberIsZero
member.summary: Curve-fitting error. The number is zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NotEnoughCrossPoints
member.summary: The waveform did not cross the mid reference level enough times to perform this measurement. Check the signal length, reference levels, and reference level units.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.AmplitudeZero
member.summary: The amplitude of the waveform is zero and cannot be used to create a histogram.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NotEnoughEdges
member.summary: The waveform did not have enough edges to perform this measurement. An edge is defined as a crossing of both the low and high reference levels. Check the signal length, reference levels, and reference level units.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.MemoryFull
member.summary: Insufficient memory available for waveform measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.WaveformSizeZero
member.summary: The input waveform size is zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.IncorrectReferenceLevels
member.summary: Reference levels are inconsistent. The low reference level must be less than or equal to the mid reference level, which must be less than or equal to the high reference level.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.IncorrectReferenceLevelUnit
member.summary: The reference level units parameter is not a valid ReferenceLevelUnit.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.DeltaTimeLEZero
member.summary: The waveform sampling interval, defined as the dt parameter, is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InvalidPercentageMethod
member.summary: The percent method parameter value is not a valid measurement method.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.HistogramSizeZero
member.summary: The histogram size parameter value is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.UndefinedResult
member.summary: The result is not a number (NaN) or infinite.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.WaveformPeriodTooShort
member.summary: The period of the waveform is too short to perform the measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.EdgeNumberLEZero
member.summary: The edge number, pulse number, or cycle parameter value is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InfiniteSlewRate
member.summary: The slew rate is infinite due to a zero rise or fall time.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InternalLibraryError
member.summary: An internal library error has occurred.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.MatrixIsRankDeficient
member.summary: Specified matrix rank is deficient. The rank of a matrix is the maximum number of independent rows or columns. A matrix of order n is rank deficient if it has a rank of less than n.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.SamplesGTZeroWarning
member.summary: A warning that the number of samples must be greater than zero.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.SingularMatrixWarning
member.summary: A warning that the input matrix is singular.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.NotSameSizeWarning
member.summary: A warning that the input matrices or vectors do not have the same size.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.ReorderNotPerformedWarning
member.summary: A warning that the reorder procedure could not be performed.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.InaccurateComputationWarning
member.summary: A warning that the computation result might be inaccurate.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.ArraySizeIncorrectWarning
member.summary: A warning that the array size is incorrect.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.StandardDeviationInvalidWarning
member.summary: A warning that the input standard deviation is invalid.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode.EmptyPolynomialWarning
member.summary: A warning that the input polynomial is empty.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisException
member.summary: Represents an error code received from the internal Analysis library.
member.remarks: When this API makes calls into the underlying Analysis library, occasionally, errors occur due to invalid configuration states, invalid parameters, and other factors. When this happens, the errors are exposed through this exception class.
member.seealso: Key Measurement Studio Analysis .NET Library Concepts

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the given error message.
member.param: Error message associated with this exception.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisException.#ctor(System.String,NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given error message and Analysis library error code.
member.param: Error message associated with this exception.
Analysis library error code that caused this exception to be thrown.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the given error message and inner exception.
member.param: Error message associated with this exception.
Inner exception that caused this exception to be thrown.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception,NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisErrorCode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given error message, inner exception, and Analysis library error code.
member.param: Error message associated with this exception.
Inner exception that caused this exception to be thrown.
Analysis library error code that caused this exception to be thrown.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the object using serialized data.
member.param: Object that holds the serialized object data.
Contextual information about the source or destination.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Sets the object with information about the exception.
member.param: Object that holds the serialized object data.
Contextual information about the source or destination.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisException.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets a code that indicates what caused the exception.
member.remarks: Every time the API calls an Analysis library operation, it checks to see whether the status of the operation indicates an error condition. If an error condition exists, the is thrown, and this error code is set to be the error code of the operation in question.
member.value: A value from the enumeration.
member.seealso: Key Measurement Studio Analysis .NET Library Concepts

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisWarning
member.summary: Represents a warning, or positive error code, received from the internal Analysis library.
member.remarks: When this API makes calls into the underlying Analysis library, warnings might occasionally occur due to invalid configuration states, invalid parameters, and other factors. When this happens, the errors are exposed through this class.

member.name: E:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisWarning.Warning
member.summary: Occurs when an analysis method generates a warning.
member.remarks: Use this event to check for any warnings that may occur after invoking a method from the Analysis library.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisWarning.SynchronizingObject
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that marshals calls to event handlers and callbacks.
member.value: The that represents the object that marshals calls to event handlers and callbacks. The default value is .
member.remarks:
When the value of this property is , calls to event handlers and callbacks are raised in the default manner. As a result, calls might occur in a thread other than the main thread. To avoid this behavior, set this property to an object that implements the interface object.
has been superseded by in .NET Framework 2.0 and later. For more information, refer to Events, Callbacks, and Thread Safety in Measurement Studio .NET Class Libraries.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisWarning.SynchronizeCallbacks
member.summary: Specifies how events and callback delegates are invoked.
member.value: if events and callbacks are invoked through the or methods; otherwise, events and callbacks are invoked directly. The default value is .
member.remarks: In some cases, callbacks and event handlers are executed in a different thread than the rest of the program. Therefore, you must take special care when accessing objects that have thread affinity, such as UI controls, from these callbacks and event handlers. For more information, refer to Events, Callbacks, and Thread Safety in Measurement Studio .NET Class Libraries.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisWarningEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the event.
member.remarks: This event occurs when the underlying Analysis library generates a warning.
member.seealso: Key Measurement Studio Analysis .NET Library Concepts

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The explanation of the warning that has occurred.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

member.summary: Returns the string representation of the value of this instance.
member.returns: A string that represents the value of this instance.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

member.summary: Gets the explanation for the analysis warning that has occurred.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisWarningEventArgs.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets the positive error code for the analysis warning that has occurred.
member.value: The positive value of the error code.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisWarningEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that handles the event.
member.param: The source of the event.
An that contains the event data.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.Analysis.Internal.ExceptionBuilder.TranslateAnalysisException(NationalInstruments.Analysis.AnalysisException)
member.summary: Translates an Analysis exception to a standard .NET exception (i.e. InvalidArgumentException), if the translation is appropriate.
member.param: AnalysisException to translate
member.returns: The AnalysisException exp, or a new standard .NET exception with exp set as the inner exception.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator
member.summary: Generates sine, square, sawtooth, and triangle waveforms.
member.remarks:
This class provides static and instance methods that you can use to generate waveform arrays. Use the static methods to fill arrays with signal patterns, specified using .
To generate continuous waveforms, create an instance of this class and then use the method to start the waveform generation. The method updates the value of the property to the phase of the point after the last one returned. This means that can be called successively to generate a continuous wave points at a time.
member.seealso: Key Measurement Studio Analysis .NET Library Concepts
Standard Edition Basic Signal Generation (All editions)

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a basic function generator.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

remarks.para: By default, the generates a sine wave. Use the overloads to specify a .

Use the method to start the waveform generation. The method updates the value of the property to the phase of the point after the last one returned. This means that can be called successively to generate a continuous wave points at a time.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.GenerateSineWave
member.summary: Generates a sine wave.
member.returns: An array containing the sine wave.
member.exception: The analysis library cannot be found.
A required operation in the analysis library cannot be found.

remarks.para: Use this method to fill an array with a sine wave pattern.
The waveform is generated using the , , , , , and properties.

To generate a continuous waveform, create a and use the method instead. The method updates the value of the property to the phase of the point after the last one returned. This means that can be called successively to generate a continuous wave points at a time.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.DefaultSignalType
member.summary: Gets the default signal type.
member.value: The signal type that is used if none is specified. The default value is .

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.DefaultFrequency
member.summary: Gets the default frequency of the signal, in hertz.
member.value: The frequency that is used if none is specified, in hertz. The default value is 100 Hz.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.DefaultAmplitude
member.summary: Gets the default amplitude of the signal.
member.value: The amplitude that is used if none is specified. The default value is 1.0.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.DefaultPhase
member.summary: Gets the default phase of the signal, in degrees.
member.value: The phase that is used if none is specified, in degrees. The default value is 0.0 degrees.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.DefaultOffset
member.summary: Gets the default offset of the signal.
member.value: The offset that is used if none is specified. The default value is 0.0.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.DefaultDutyCycle
member.summary: Gets the default duty cycle of the signal, as a percentage.
member.value: The duty cycle, as a percentage, that is used if none is specified. The default value is 50.0 percent.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.DefaultNumberOfSamples
member.summary: Gets the default number of samples returned from each call to .
member.value: The number of samples that is used if none is specified. The default value is 1000.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.DefaultSamplingRate
member.summary: Gets the default sampling rate of the signal, in hertz.
member.value: The sampling rate that is used if none is specified, in hertz. The default value is 1000.0 Hz.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.SignalType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of signal to generate.
member.value: A value from the enumeration.The default is .
member.exception: Specified value is not valid enum value. Use to specify a valid value.
member.remarks: This value specifies what type of signal returns.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.Frequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the waveform frequency, in hertz.
member.value: The frequency of the waveform, in hertz. The default is .
member.exception: cannot be less than 0.0.
member.remarks: This value specifies the frequency of the waveform that returns.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.Amplitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the waveform amplitude.
member.value: The amplitude of the waveform. The default is .
member.remarks: This value specifies the amplitude of the waveform that returns.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.Phase
member.summary: Gets or sets the phase of the waveform, in degrees.
member.value: The phase of the waveform, in degrees. The default is .
member.remarks: This value specifies the phase of the waveform that returns.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of the waveform.
member.value: The offset of the waveform. The default is .
member.remarks: This value specifies the offset of the waveform that returns.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.DutyCycle
member.summary: Gets or sets the square waveform duty cycle, in percent.
member.value: The duty cycle of the square waveform, in percent. The default is . This value must be in the range 0.0 to 100.0, inclusive.
member.exception: is not between 0.0 and 100.0.
member.remarks: This value specifies the duty cycle of the waveform that returns. uses this value only when the value of is . Otherwise, this value is ignored.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.SamplingRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the sampling rate, in hertz.
member.value: The sampling rate, in hertz. The default is .
member.exception: cannot be less than 0.0.
member.remarks: This value specifies the sampling rate that uses to create the waveform it returns.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.Analysis.SignalGeneration.BasicFunctionGenerator.NumberOfSamples
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of samples in the waveform.
member.value: The number of samples in the waveform. The default is .
member.exception: cannot be less than zero.
member.remarks: This value specifies the number of samples in the waveform that returns.
